channel.title: Can't attack NPC's, disconnects me every time?
channel.description:
im yousing cwars pk (based off of project16 v 6) when i try to attack an npc it disconnects me. i tred looking for 'disconnect == true' but cant find any related to my problem.
p.s. all i looked under was in client.java.
